Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Caroline Serviced Apartments South Yarra in South Yarra, you'll be in a shopping district and convenient to Como Centre and Melbourne Cricket Ground. This 4.5-star apartment is close to Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and St. Kilda Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Caroline Serviced Apartments South Yarra in South Yarra, you'll be in a shopping district and convenient to Como Centre and Melbourne Cricket Ground. This 4.5-star apartment is close to Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and St. Kilda Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Como Centre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Jam Factory - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Prahran Market - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Royal Botanic Gardens - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Como House - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
AAMI Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Shrine of Remembrance - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Albert Park Golf Course - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Hisense Arena - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Albert Park Lake - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Rod Laver Arena - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Melbourne Cricket Ground - 2 km / 1.3 mi
National Sports Museum - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Australian Centre for Contemporary Art - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Astor Theatre - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi

The preferred airport for Caroline Serviced Apartments South Yarra is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 22.3 km / 13.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
